name: Devolve Online
storyline: Your avatar exists in The Void, a digital realm controlled by powerful entities vying for supremacy. From there, you take command of a vehicle on the surface to battle for resources. Each journey is unique, with customizable weapons, abilities, and random buffs dropped by enemies or players you defeat. You must secure your path to extraction, as only successfully stored resources can be used for crafting and upgrades.
summary: An action MMORPG third-person shooter that blends classic MMORPG persistent progression with short, session-based challenges where hundreds of players fight for growth at once, seamlessly integrated into the dynamic, expansive, ongoing game world.
